alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 2:44PM MDT until April 06 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 1 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected at pass level, with higher amounts in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph at times. * WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 1 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
